prerequisites: Prerequisite: Russian 205 or permission of the instructor
summary: A survey of Russia's literature of the fantastic, including: saints' lives, fairy tales, and works by writers such as Pushkin, Gogol, Dostoevsky, Leskov, Remizov, Grin, Platonov, A.N. Tolstoy, Kharms, Kataev, Sinyavsky, Pelevin, Petrushevskaia. This course is conducted in Russian.
title: Russia's Literature of the Uncanny
